title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Park Newspaper Archive
body: Park Newspaper Archive       The links below will open PDFs of our past editions of the Granite Journal, the official newspaper of Mount Rushmore National Memorial. You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0 or higher (available free online) to view these files. 2015 Annual Edition 2015 (1.36 MB PDF) 2014 Annual Edition 2014 (1.36 MB PDF)  2013 Summer 2013 (1.38 MB PDF) 2012  Winter 2012 - 2013 (1.6 MB PDF) Summer 2012 (1.1 MB PDF)
